frontmatter.title: Composition
frontmatter.description: `Value.Composition` combines two or more `Value.*` components into one.

frontmatter.title: String
frontmatter.description: `Value.String` is a base component for displaying values of the type `string`.

frontmatter.title: SummaryList
frontmatter.description: `Value.SummaryList` uses definition lists to semantically make content consumable for screen readers.

frontmatter.title: Number
frontmatter.description: `Value.Number` is a base component for displaying values of the type `number`.

frontmatter.title: Boolean
frontmatter.description: `Value.Boolean` is a base component for displaying values of the type `boolean`.
